attributes.action: to provide an open and accountable expenses system that cannot be abused by greedy MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If George Brown means what he says about a more transparent Government, he will put a stop to the disgusting abuse of public money by arrogant, greedy MP's from all parties and make them justify every penny they claim in expenses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
